title: To Riot: Disable Xerath Please
body:
**Message to Riot:**

Search youtube for "Tobias Fate Xerath Global Q Script".

While you're at it, you might like to ban people using this site: *site removed*
The Xerath's script advertises it.

Scripting is stupid. There's people using this already on different servers e.g. *name removed* and I wouldn't want to see another TSM Ezreal on OCE.

Thanks.

replies.body:
Also check youtube for "Gagong Teemo" - the author testing out the script there.

P.S. Why would you remove a link to a player's op.gg ? Try *link removed* instead if it helps.
Yeah sure I'll try _link removed_ instead.
Be my guest. Or you could just stop being rude on the forums (not just this thread), and check youtube for "Gagong Teemo" for some videos on the matter.
Or you could just take a joke for what it is.

This script is very wrong but what is wrong is that Riot has been told about this for what a week or 2 now and yet nothing has been done. This is awful that they care more about the SHIT CLIENT then this script that is ruining high elo games like Tobias and many others.

115/0/1? 

100% win rate across 15 games as Xerath?

"Perfect kda" averaging at 59.9/0.0/2.9 across 15 games?

lol wtf?

What kind of loser cheats as blatantly as that?

..........

But yeah, I've heard about the Xerath global Q bug that could be exploited via a script, which the latter is already illegal in and of itself but then some people have now decided that they're cool with using scripts to exploit bugs, and spam that every game? Damn.
